video_prompt: A hand gripping a steaming mug in the foreground. Rain streaks down a window overlooking a bustling city street. Umbrellas bob through crosswalks below. Neon reflections stretch across wet pavement. Lights flicker in numerous building windows.
image_prompt: High-angle anime/comic art of a bustling Tokyo street in a rainstorm, viewed from a window. Wet multi-lane road reflects vibrant neon signs and building lights (blue, red, yellow streaks). Rain streaking and splattering on glass. Numerous pedestrians with umbrellas on white crosswalks. Tall buildings with lit windows and Japanese signs. Foreground: prominent hand holding steaming orange mug, bottom right. Cozy, contemplative mood.
refined_video_prompt: Steam wafts from the mug. Rain streaks down the window. The city street bustles with activity as umbrellas bob through crosswalks below. Neon reflections shimmer and distort across the wet pavement with passing movement. Lights flicker in building windows.
